meanings.sent1: The logway through the forest was bumpy but charming.
meanings.sent2: The logway winding through the woods was a picturesque sight.
meanings.sent3: The logway in the park made the squirrels think they were on a rollercoaster.
meanings.sent4: The logway stretched out like a wooden ribbon through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The logway was like a wooden puzzle connecting the different parts of the forest.

meanings.definition: A path or route for transporting logs.
meanings.sent1: The logway was used to transport the heavy logs from the forest.
meanings.sent2: The logway led straight to the sawmill for processing the logs.
meanings.sent3: The logway became a busy highway for the lumberjacks and their logs.
meanings.sent4: The logway resembled a conveyor belt moving the logs efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The logway acted as a wooden conveyor belt carrying the logs to their destination.

meanings.definition: A way or means of recording or keeping track of information.
meanings.sent1: The logway of the ancient civilization was etched on stone tablets.
meanings.sent2: The logway of the computer system stored all the data securely.
meanings.sent3: The logway of the library was like a magical book that never ran out of pages.
meanings.sent4: The logway of memory worked like a filing cabinet storing all the important details.
meanings.sent5: The logway of the diary was a personal journal of thoughts and memories.
